website_summaries.verdict: With its tiny chassis, touch screen, and affordable price tag, the Asus VivoBook X202E-BH91T-CB gives users a decent alternative to ultrabooks and tablets, though it can't do much beyond daily computing tasks.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is still kicking
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for over 5 years now. It still works just fine, if a little slow. I've replaced the hard-drive (which is normal as hard-drives don't necessarily last as long) and I would have replaced the processor if it wasn't hard-wired into it. They simply don't make them like the used to and I was so upset when it just stopped multi-tasking efficiently and had to get a new one. Needless to say, everyone in the family still uses it for personal use because EVERYTHING on it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fail all the time, didn't work well since the begining
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar laptop and works well, but this laptop fail since it arrive, the keyboard always fail and it never get to a solution, we thought that it was software but after different actualizations never work, we change the keyboard, didn't work either, after that the touchscreem start to fail and has to be disabled. In resume, this laptop sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro A. Fontanive

customer_reviews.title: It's not the computer's fault Windows 8 has a learning curve!
customer_reviews.text: First time I ever got a new computer (there have been many) and I wasn't operating it like a pro in minutes.Beware! When you buy with Windows 8, prepare to buy a "Dummies" book. And make sure to get a touchscreen, like this little beauty--that's what Windows 8 is for--not for mousing and keystrokes. The little computer is fast, fun, very light. Perfect for surfin and light computer work. My husband thinks the screen is too small for movies--I think it's perfect. Crystal clear and sound is fine. It's NOT a gaming machine. I traded down from a 13.3 Toshiba Satellite that is coughing its last breaths and I love. Great little machine for the "pinklover" in your life.
customer_reviews.author: J. Binette

customer_reviews.title: Great little laptop
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop. Was purchased mainly for traveling. Will mostly be used for game apps and email while on the road. Still struggling a bit with Windows 8.1 (which you have to update to), but that is not an Asus problem. The laptop is a perfect size and the battery life is perhaps not the 5 hours advertised, but it is reasonable....haven't actually timed it out. And I LOVE the pink color. It's one possible minus is that when the battery needs replacing, you have to remove the back of the unit to get to the battery; however it CAN be done. I'm just hoping that maybe the original will last until I'm ready for an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: BG Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great performance
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop for a great price.. I ordered this along with a 120gb samsung SSD (7mm as it must be a low profile SSD) and an intel wifi/bluetooth card, knowing I'd want those two upgrades.. swapping out the stock hard drive and wifi card was a piece of cake - only took 10 minutes. To all those who say this laptop is too slow - upgrade to an SSD.. it makes a world of difference, and is completely silent (compared to a traditional HDD which you can hear). I don't use the touch-screen much, but it is multi-touch which is nice. Overall, a great value. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Top technology
customer_reviews.text: Its 2019 and im writing the review till now. To give it time for usage you know. But up to date, I haven’t had any ANY problems with it. I have it on windows 10. Never dropped. Still good.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not so great, fragile, slow
customer_reviews.text: It's VERY slow, even for an i3. As for durability, well, let's just say, treat it with kidd gloves. It's VERY fragile, with a minor bump on the lid cracking the screen. If you are looking for an inexpensive laptop for kids, this isn't it due to how fragile it is. As it comes with Windows 8, I just have to say that based on 20+ years of IT experience, Windows 8 is a total disaster. You are going to be much better off with a Windows 7 laptop or a laptop that has a downgradable license and comes with Win7.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good laptop for under $500. Was looking to upgrade my wife's horribly outdated netbook (I would have never approved if the purchase of a netbook haha). After researching I decided on this little laptop. i3 intel processor, touchscreen, functional keyboard for being smaller, and even the touchpad is pretty decent (and I'm a Mac user). She mostly does homework with some light web browsing and music streaming and the computer holds up well. If you're looking for something affordable but still very functional, this is the laptop you might be looking for.
customer_reviews.author: rvalenz

customer_reviews.title: Trackpad issues; other than that, good.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend, who uses it constantly. The performance is very good, as expected from an Asus, as well as the battery life. There is one important drawback, however: the trackpad is way too sensitive and positioned in such a way that, at certain angles, it's easy to brush it with the back of the palm while typing, which can make your cursor move and your focus to be lost. It can be difficult to write something long, and it's very frustrating when filling up web forms. Of course, this can be solved by just deactivating the trackpad and using an external mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Augusto López Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for my wife and she loves it. She wanted a smaller laptop to take around with her, and this one's size is perfect for her. I installed Windows 8.1 for her after we received it and it works well. Personally, I'm not a fan of Windows 8/8.1, but once you spend a little time figuring it out you can do a lot with the operating system. I personally like Asus products because they're a great value for the money and they stand the test of time. I would definitely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: WUB

customer_reviews.title: runs faster and has better streaming video
customer_reviews.text: How is it that I had a laptop with a TB and 8G, and yet this is faster? It boots faster, runs faster and has better streaming video. Better than that, it costs $200 less than the other laptop that kept dropping off the network and I had to take it back. The only frustration that I had was that I ordered a pink laptop and received black from the seller. Amazon would have fixed the problem for me, even though it was not the seller's error, but I decided to keep it. You will love this laptop if you try it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problems with system updates in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: shipping was quick. the computer itself gave trouble in the beginning. there were days i couldn't even use it because the system wasn't functioning properly. it would start a necessary windows update but when i restarted the computer, it would say "reverting changes" until i did a complete reboot of the system. I was going to return it, and started the process and the vendor was timely to issue the return, but then read that the there was a 20% restocking fee. since my initial troubles with it, it hasn't given anymore problems thus far thankfully. since it's been working. it's been good, touchscreen works great, the computer is fast. windows 8 is a pain though!
customer_reviews.author: Jo D

customer_reviews.title: good enough for the casual user
customer_reviews.text: Laptop is nice for the casual user - creating/editing documents, browsing the internet, watching occasional movies but it does lag when you try to open too many windows. Its a small device - great for travelling but definitely cannot be used for work as it lacks power. Touch screen is nice but the track pad is horrible. I would definitely recommend using a mouse to avoid frustration.
customer_reviews.author: maximus31ad

customer_reviews.title: Great small laptop! Has more than enough power for average user (with an SSD installed)
customer_reviews.text: Great small laptop, Touch screen is responsive as is the track pad. Definitely a lot of value with this laptop. Sturdy body construction and pink looks great especially with aluminum finish. I bought this for my wife and she loves it! I do suggest installing an SSD as it is night and day in terms of performance. I stopped using HDDs over 5 years ago and makes a world of difference especially in this laptop. If you're looking for a gaming machine look elsewhere. It is very light weight and of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Simt3k

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, quality built
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this based on reviews and I'm pleasantly surprised how nice it really is. I got the pink because my wife loves pink......no seriously, she does, it wasn't for me. It's the perfect couch potato, sit it in your lap and surf the web laptop. We don't stress it by running applications, playing games, etc. For her, it's her surfin', emailin' Pink beauty. Bonus is she has a new Windows phone so all these devices work great together.
customer_reviews.author: Prime addict :)

customer_reviews.title: For the Price you can not go wrong!!
customer_reviews.text: this lil guy ended up being a huge payoff for the price its very fast and responsive, and gives all that it promises and really is a very nice lil piece of hardware.Now while allthough our product didn't come in the color specified it came in a color that costs more anyway so really tough to complain about that aspect of it. had some issues with the product key but secondipty really did come through in the end and i am very very happy with my choice to go with them and this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Romes

customer_reviews.title: I love my little laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer when my last one stopped working. I love it the touch screen is AMAZING I don't think I could go back to a non touch screen laptop after this one! It took a long while to get used to windows 8 and I still don't love it BUT I am putting up with it. This computer does have a lot more updates than any other computer I have ever owned BUT I still love this computer. The battery life is pretty good I do use it alot and it has been keeping up with me so far!
customer_reviews.author: SKE

customer_reviews.title: toooooooo slooooooow
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter 2 months before Christmas season. Obviously, it was her Christmas gift. I didn't dare open the package to check if it was working at all. When she opened it, it took forever to start and to get connected to anything.. programs, apps, internet, updates.. name it.. it was like living in dial up age. I would have returned it if it hadn't taken too long from the purchase date. If you have time .. lots of time to spare.. get this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlady

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small laptop that was easy to carry traveling and my last one was an ACER Aspire One. I wanted some new features and after extensive research I found this one and love it! Took me a few days to get used to Windows 8 but once I learned to use it and organize my start page I actually like it. The touch screen is needed with Windows 8 and as I have an all in one for our home computer I was happy to have this feature. Great price and value. Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: mikeysmom

customer_reviews.title: Purchased May 2013...still working.
customer_reviews.text: Still working. I've done nothing to this laptop. Still works fine after 7 years.
customer_reviews.author: T B.

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to run her personal stuff on as well as to surf the web. It works really well. It came nicely packaged and the pink is really nice. I'm really impressed by the quality of this product. I was not expecting this from ASUS to be honest. I initially bought this due to the really good price and nice features......lets just say you get a lot of bang for ur buck with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kameel

customer_reviews.title: Really Like My Laptop
customer_reviews.text: So far I am really enjoying my ASUS. The touchscreen in great, price is totally reasonable and it is lightweight. The speakers are loud enough and the screen is nice and clear. The only downside is that the touchscreen can be kind of wonky and when I am moving the mouse it thinks I am touching the screen sometimes and will switch screens while I am trying to do something. I must admit this Is annoying, but all these being equal great laptop for the $$$$
customer_reviews.author: lilblondjen

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Quick, screen very sensitive to touch. Good performance, keyboard and screen of high level. Battery life is shorter than I expected - max. 3 hours. I am a little concerned about the charger: this is my first week with this laptop and after 5 days the charger have started presenting intermittent contact with the laptop when connected. After plug and unplug from wall about 5 times it starts charging. I expect this will stop in an automatic system updating. Light laptop and good size to fit in a small back bag.
customer_reviews.author: JOAO B.

customer_reviews.title: It still works great. I have updated it to windows 10 now
customer_reviews.text: Its been 3 years I am using this laptop. It still works great . I have updated it to windows 10 now. (It took a while for update to windows 10 was available for ASUS), apart from that no issues. Touch works good. This laptop does require a little care and doesnt look sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Shilp

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! Such a lightweight but powerful computer. Tons of memory, easy to carry, starts up super fast. I do not recommend allowing Windows 8.1 to update your computer cuz that's where the real excitement started. This is one of those great out of the box purchases that works right away. The mouse is sensitive and the screen will scroll a little more than I like it to, but all in all, I love this little powerhouse! Can't go wrong with pink either!
customer_reviews.author: NC girl

customer_reviews.title: So in love
customer_reviews.text: I received this for an early birthday present. I love the color (pink). The size is perfect also. The keyboard is really nice and the keys are spaced out nicely instead of crammed right next to each other like other laptops. I love the touch screen also. It took some time getting used to along with Windows 8, but once I learned it, I fell in love. There's a good amount of memory and its very fast too.
customer_reviews.author: Am Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the value
customer_reviews.text: Laptop easy use just upgrade ssd for faster I use it all the time regular use Battery life is good
customer_reviews.author: jefri

customer_reviews.title: bought for my daughter going to school. charging cable ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for my daughter going to school. charging cable failed and was replaced by square trade coverage with no issue. A couple weeks after getting the laptop back the hard drive failed. This was a bit more work getting the issue resolved but square trade came through and replaced the drive. This completed and ended my coverage.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable office
customer_reviews.text: I am not a major techie, however with my job becoming more and more technology oriented I needed a computer that was compact and could be a central hub for much of my tasks for work and for graduate school. This was the perfect fit. It syncs with my smart phone and I can access just about any thing anywhere with the sky drive that comes with. You will have to get your own office suites for word processing ect. but even that is an easy process with multiple options. I recommend this computer to any student or professional wanting to keep in touch and stay on task with the hectic events of an advancing technology based society.
customer_reviews.author: antiquebooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Have had this laptop for several months now and have no complaints whatsoever, it is lightweight and does the job. Have no issues with internet connectivity or anything, just a functional working laptop perfect for travel and light usage. Battery takes kinda long to charge compared to other laptops I have, but it is not enough of a concern to lose any stars over.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great computer!
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 4 years. I only had to fix it once and that was because of virus. It also fell twice from my bed and still worked as normal. The best computer I ever had. Small easy to carry and work perfect for my school.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: Cool pink
customer_reviews.text: Pink X202E plus pink wireless mouse from logitech plus pink carry cover from cosmos for 12 yo daughter for school use. Small and light weight are a huge plus and the i3 is more than enough cpu for what a 12 year old needs in school. School use consists almost entirely of writing documents with google docs and learning how to collaborate with other students/teacher using gmail/docs inside a walled-off google universe.
customer_reviews.author: nonzero

customer_reviews.title: hard drive issues
customer_reviews.text: After just five months of owning this the hard drive failed. It was under warranty, and since the damage was on their part not mine they covered the repair, so I sent it in (which costed money) and they replaced it. They never informed me that they had fixed it and I just received it back in the mail with a note saying they had replaced the hard drive. Now not even a month after getting it fixed the brand new hard drive is broken again! Of course this time it will not be covered under the warranty. I will not be buying an Asus again.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabee

customer_reviews.title: need only an illuminated Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: hi, the only reason that make me gave 4 stars instead of 5 is the illuminated keyboard is not avaioable in this one. Which is very useful and practical. Now am writing the review from this item. It is just fine till now , touch screen is cool . I love the brad so I chose this guy. ALL GOOD ONLY THE ILLUMINAED KEYBOARD thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: nice laptop, Wi-Fi was broken
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little laptop for a few days. Nice size, decent battery life, and I love the touch screen. I had to spend several hours figuring out how to use windows 8, but it was worth it because of the screen. I bought it because I was going to be without a laptop for a weeks and the price was right. But, the Wi-Fi stopped working after a few days and no driver fiddling or clean installing could fix it. I think the actual hardware was bad. I returned it, with no issues. Anyways, if I needed a new laptop if give it another try, buy I have my old one one back now so that's that.
customer_reviews.author: catsupdog

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is perfect for what I needed. I use it at work to take notes in meetings and to access files over our network. The touchscreen is great and an added bonus. The size is perfect, small enough to fit in my medium size purse. The pink color is fun and gives it some personality. Lots of people at work ask me about it.
customer_reviews.author: iamlor

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for minus the color, which is a little weird, but hey, it was cheaper! This little computer is a great travel companion and has everything I need - mainly, internet and sound, though I'm happy writing documents, power points, etc. The touch screen is still a little weird but not hard to figure out. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: ElieVin

customer_reviews.title: I would have put 5 stars but a key came broken :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop in October but the "M" key came broken off. It still types after a few tries & I have to be careful not to lose it, which is ridiculous, but the laptop is wonderful otherwise. I just wish I knew how to fix the "M" key so I can type up my school papers properly.
customer_reviews.author: DeorajS

customer_reviews.title: My Girlfriend LOVES IT! it Works and performs super fast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop for my girlfriend and she loves it, i was kinda hesitant on windows 8 so i decided to go for the touchscreen and it works flawlessly!! no slowdowns, no hiccups. the webcam is really good, we stayed up 5 hours straight just talking with no lag or stutter at all, it has 500g of HDD and thats more than for her needs, the ram performs well as we also play some some steam games on there just at medium to low settings though. DUHH. but overall i would recommend this beauty to anyone wanting a decent laptop and needs to be extremy mobile. im planning on getting for my self!
customer_reviews.author: Micklo202

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Lightweight, Stays Cool, Great Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is ideal for traveling or being on the move. Touch-screen is a great way to make Wiindows 8 easier to use, like the perfect combination of tablet and notebook. Very impressed with the performance and low heat aspects - nothing more annoying for me than trying to use a laptop that feels like a furnace on my lap, so really love the way this one runs cool.
customer_reviews.author: GuyQ

customer_reviews.title: Crappiest piece of junk ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Crappiest piece of junk ever. Started having problems right away, they wouldn't replace it. (it's clearly a lemon). And have had trouble since. But needed it for classes at school 18 units worth. Had problems all along and now it died. No customer service and a total waste of money. Avoid at all costs!!
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Totally matches my expectation
customer_reviews.text: Likes: The size is perfect for me. It weighs almost nothing, you need to be careful not to forget that you're carrying it in your backpack! Nice screen, clear image and the touch works perfectly. Turns on and off very fast. Dislikes: Still need some time do get how Windows 8 works... but that's not about the laptop. Mousepad sometimes fails, but nothing too serious.
customer_reviews.author: VCS

customer_reviews.title: Worst investment ever in a PC and it looks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Battery problems from day one and although I sent it back on warranty which they honoured and fixed that only last a month or so then the battery problems arose again. By then the warranty had expired and I just dumped it. Worst investment ever in a PC and it looks and feels like such a durable machine.
customer_reviews.author: G. S-S

customer_reviews.title: ASUS is the only way to go!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our family and friends have all been switching to ASUS and no one regrets it a bit. This one was for my 12 year old son(pink so it would be harder for him to lose). He tosses this thing aroud like a school book and it is in perfect shape still. VERY impressed with the high quality and durability of ASUS products. I hope they keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: frosty

customer_reviews.title: but this laptop is very good for home use
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4 of these laptops for personal, home use. As of late 2015, this is considered "old", but this laptop is very good for home use. The only negative is that an i5 processor would have increased the speed. The size and weight are excellent for use on one's lap.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love my little pink Touchscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 14 or less inch touchscreen just to take with me when I'm out and about. This works perfect for what I need it for. Very quick response! Learning to use Windows 8 is best on a touchscreen I believe. Couldn't be happier with it...
customer_reviews.author: T. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: COOL!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop doesn't feel cheap at all, has a touchscreen panel, i broght this for my sister (mostly for her homework) and she is very happy, this metal design feels good, and the performance is acceptable, (4 hours battery, core i3, ram 4g windows 8)........
customer_reviews.author: Lester

customer_reviews.title: a good product
customer_reviews.text: this is a good product for the price, it meets the basic needs that I have, while being chic and lightweight for me to move around with. Its processing speed is fast it allows me to open multiple tabs and have several programmes running without slowing and freezing. Still getting use to the windows 8 but its okay, not as difficult as I feared as I'm not very tech savy
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love this laptop. I fit my needs - the feel of a laptop with the ease of use of a tablet. The touch screen is very responsive and I haven't had any trouble at all. The design is sleek. It's slightly heavier than other laptops this size but it's quite sturdy which is better for me. The speakers are also generally louder than other laptops I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: laraujo

customer_reviews.title: Bad computer
customer_reviews.text: Lousy computer very bad quality, a real lemon. Right after the warranty was up everything started going wrong. I was a really big ASUS fan until this computer. Will never buy another ASUS product. Just junk.
customer_reviews.author: jerry j

customer_reviews.title: Decent But Register it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard broke after awhile and some keys didn't register unless the screen was used. Make sure to register it!!!!! the warranty wasn't activated because of my laziness. But if you buy it register it when you can!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ian H.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible from the Start.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Problems from the beginning! Barely used as I purchased for daughter to use for school and she ended up using mine most of the time because it was so slow. Could be Windows 8 OS or crappy touchscreen computer. Finally, after using for a few days 6 months later to watch shows on Netflix, it does not take a charge or turn on. Called support where they could not help and said I would have to mail it in. I will never buy another ASUS or another laptop that uses Windows 8 - both are terrible and frustratingly SLOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: JCAVA

customer_reviews.title: Hard drive failure, with loss of all data, after 30 days
customer_reviews.text: Catastrophic hard drive failure, with loss of all data, after 30 days of use with no physical damage to the computer -- no drops, no spills. I was very fortunate that Amazon allowed me to return it. Definitely NOT recommended!
customer_reviews.author: A. Block

customer_reviews.title: A inexpensive way to upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an affordable way to upgrade to win8 as in a ipad and still have the ability to have a full laptop with which I am more familiar. This was in the price range that worked even though the screen size was smaller than a normal laptop the ability to enlargen the the focal display has allowed me to use te smaller screen.
customer_reviews.author: B. Baldridge

customer_reviews.title: Love this computer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this computer for myself and love it! Great price, nice touch. It is compatible with my printer and is small enough to take anywhere. The battery does need to be charged more frequently than other laptops I have had, but it is no problem for my usage.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and does everything my daughter needs at college
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and does everything my daughter needs at college ! She is going on year two with it! About to by two more for our other two that leave for college thus year !
customer_reviews.author: sandy holt1!

customer_reviews.title: and it sucks. When I am in the middle of finishing ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer a year ago, and it sucks. When I am in the middle of finishing a paper it will start configuring. The first months it will automatically update for 30min almost every 3 days. After I manually shut off the updates, it was working fine for a couple months. Keep in mind I never download anything, not even Microsoft Word. After a couple months it started configuring for over 72 hours, unable to shut off. I would never recommend anyone to buy this computer, especially if you rely on it for school or work.
customer_reviews.author: marisela

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Need to replace my old netbook within a budget. This is perfect. Touchscreen is sensitive and responds quickly. Still getting used to Windows8, beginning to like it. First ASUS; glad I gave them a try.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sweany

customer_reviews.title: useful for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lighter travel computer, not wanting to spend the money on an a Mac Airbook. It does the job well, but touchscreen a bit sluggish and I have to be careful with mouse, little room for error.
customer_reviews.author: Friper

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing this laptop...but it was for school and so for the price this laptop is worth every single penny! The sound quality is great the touchscreen is wonderful and I love the pink color. I watch movies and the video quality is also nice! My friends and family loves it as well! I would recommend this to anyone! It boots quickly and also is very light weight so its easily carried around. I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this 11pm and chose next day delivery, it arrived by 10:30am the next day. Laptop is great. Ran system update couple times, a couple reboots and then it allowed me to Upgrade to Windows 8.1. Everything works great. I'll probably upgrade the hard drive to SSD soon to get that extra speed, but overall, best new laptop $400 can get.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: you should get this computer
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer its small so i can carry it to school and its not heavy. But does everything i need it to do. And its so cute! Being a touch screen is just an added plus to the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Good transition between PC and tablet
customer_reviews.text: This works well and replaces an older Dell Laptop that has been a clunker from almost day 1. Touchpad drivers should definitely be updated immediately as the original is not very responsive and somewhat spastic in operation. New drivers are much better. This is my wife's machine and to make the machine immediately useful for her I installed Classic Shell to give the Windows 8 The old Windows 7 look and feel. For the price it will meet most casual users needs and it is nicely compact. It is also quite well built for this segment and has a bit of the Macbook look for about 600 less.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: good laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very light, fast, touch screen is great. Touch pad is a bother but can be disabled with F9. Sometimes requires some extra drivers from ASUS to allow that. No cd rom drive. Windows 8. Battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: Good computer/Great price
customer_reviews.text: Good computer, convenient size, touchscreen works well with windows 8, speakers sound decent for being on the side of the computer. Only downfall would be the disc drive if one was desired. Bought the computer to replace my old computer. Being a college student and needing the type papers, work in bigger groups, share documents easily, listen to music, brows the web, this computer can handle these tasks with ease. Would recommend this computer on the features available for the price to buy.
customer_reviews.author: That One Guy

customer_reviews.title: Awsome combination of performance, quality, style, and value!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome laptop for the price. Windows 8 with touchscreen and brushed aluminum finish with quality feel. Upgraded the hard drive with SSD and this thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: rsfinsrq

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: You will too if you can stand windows 8. Hardware is good, lightweight, functional and responsive. I personally do not like or use windows 8 but spouse and daughter do.
customer_reviews.author: M Vid

customer_reviews.title: Decent comptuer
customer_reviews.text: The computer works well and serves its purpose. However, if you try to do to many things on the computer at once (e.g., have a lot of windows open in Chrome), it will slow down to a crawl.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: Pink rocks
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little machine. Very durable too. Not a huge fan of Windows 8, but adore my Asus netbook. The speakers were a nice surprise--the sound is actually pretty darned terrific.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Always love Asus
customer_reviews.text: I am Asus's fan. I gotta Asus laptop and tablet. All of them work very well. Even i cant image after few months I bought this laptop, the price has increased.......I love Asus.
customer_reviews.author: cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I chose this computer for my girlfriend. She is so happy with it. The Processor, Hard Drive and Memory... And Ofcourse the touch screen, were my criteria for the choice. So far tge computer wrks very well, very fast and easy to use. This is my first time to use W8, so I am not 100% comfortable, but that will come with time I assume. The design is pretty stylish. My girlfriend loves it. I would recomend this computer to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Maurtua

customer_reviews.title: and it still works great. I upgraded it to Windows 10 preview
customer_reviews.text: I've had it over a year now. I haven't had to replace anything, and it still works great. I upgraded it to Windows 10 preview. I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rose

customer_reviews.title: For me
customer_reviews.text: Other than being a bit confused by Windows 8, I love this machine. It's quiet and fast, especially when compared to "The Beast", my 4 or 5 year old HP 17" laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ann C.

customer_reviews.title: Its a cute nice laptop, good performance and touch was pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Its a cute nice laptop, good performance and touch was pretty good. No issues until it completely exactly after 1 year warranty is expired. Mother board gone bad after 1 year 2 months and ASUS charging more than its price to fix it. Not sure what percentage of their laptops going bad in a year, but if its low well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: R. avirneni

customer_reviews.title: Gave to my daughter for her school work
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter was SOooooooo excited with the touch screen feature. Product was shipped from my account, DIRECTLY to her home....with FREE SHIPPING ! Great computer for college students !
customer_reviews.author: Late Appliance Repair

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little computer
customer_reviews.text: Asus computer is a nice with all the features I needed. It performs according to expectations. It small size give me the portability and storage I need. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sixta T. Hall

customer_reviews.title: nice color
customer_reviews.text: Although the little computer looks good, it will barely hold a charge long enough to get any work done on it. If you leave it plugged in all the time it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college students
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for two years now and it still runs perfectly. I am a student so this is a perfect little laptop to carry around on campus with me, it's lightweight, the touch screen is a major plus and it is compatible with windows 10. I am not tech savvy whatsoever so I have no authority to say anything about the intricacies of how it runs but as an average college student this perfectly suits my needs
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lundholm

customer_reviews.title: Keeps dropping the wifi
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice little laptop and seems to work well---- when I can keep it connected to the internet.... I am just learning Windows 8 and really don't like it much yet but that is just getting use to it. Wish I could find a way to stay connected and then I would really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very Good. I bought for my daughter for over a year ago. She is happy with it and had no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sam E. Koussa

customer_reviews.title: Good laptop, versatil, affordable and small
customer_reviews.text: I recently bougth again this laptop because some months ago I bought it for my elder daugther and she was very happy and comfy. It's a good design, tiny and powerful, touchscreen and windows 8, in general, all she wanted to store her music, videos, etc. The second one is for my second daugther because she was suffering with her heavy old laptop. AB
customer_reviews.author: Alain Bolaños Hinojosa

customer_reviews.title: Great, light protable laptop
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this laptop for about 3-4 weeks now and I can say that all the reviews for it here on amazon are pretty accurate. I only use it for going on the internet, streaming netflix and writing papers. It does everything that I want it to do. I feel I got a lot more value out of this purchase than what I paid for. I would recommend product to my family and friends for sure.
customer_reviews.author: aldo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my High Schooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my High Schooler. She uses it all the time for homework and research. Very affordable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Mann

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and compact. The new Windows, however, ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and compact. The new Windows, however, is a pain in the neck! I've had this laptop for 3 months now and I still can't get used to Windows! I have had some problems with the laptop freezing, also with it not communicating with my wireless printer, but am unsure if this is a hardware or software issue.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old netbook with this computer and it really is functional. The touchscreen makes windows 8 more palatable.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer
customer_reviews.text: Love the new computer. The touch screen, the size, the weight, the color. The price was great too. It was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: A fantastic powerhouse of a computer
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic powerhouse of a computer. It is lightweight and great for college student who walks a lot. I like how quickly it starts up and the size of the keyboard because I have small hands. I am going on my one year anniversary of owning this computer and still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small form notebook. It's well made and quiet; I can't hear it when it's turned on! For the price it's hard to beat!!
customer_reviews.author: Snelly

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive item as described
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t receive the listed product. It was a different color with damage to the front of the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Megan2893

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This computer locks up frequently and every action is extremely slow. No idea how it has four stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: ausus
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is compressed and a little hard to get used to. The touchscreen is great and the light weight makes a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this guy for my mother's birthday and she love it! Except she had to get used to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this guy for my mother's birthday and she love it! Except she had to get used to Windows 8
customer_reviews.author: Smeha

customer_reviews.title: Nice computer
customer_reviews.text: I loved this computer. Felt nice and powerful. The updates took a while though. I returned it only because I didn't like the small screen size. That had no affect on the review score for this laptop though.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Windows 8 skeptic at first
customer_reviews.text: I didnt want this laptop at first because it ran on Windows 8, but I actually enjoyed learning how to work Windows 8. If you are a low-tech person I wouldn't recommend this laptop, but if you are more tech savvy I would consider this laptop. I love the touch screen and had no idea how I ever survived without a touch screen laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Courtcourtp

customer_reviews.title: Best touchscreen Windows 8 netbook replacement for the money
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard, and track pad are excellent. I wish it were a little lighter,weight, but it's a much better computer than my old netbook.
customer_reviews.author: HarryG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was Christmas gift for my daughter. It was her 18th and she needed something to take along with her to college. She'd love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the computer, but I like windows 7 much better than windows 8. Other than that it's pretty cool, a little touchy and that can be aggravating, but it's very nice!

customer_reviews.title: Great size and easy of use
customer_reviews.text: First computer for our teen and she loves it's portability and easy of use. A separate disc drive was purchased to increase it's flexibility. Additional speakers are next to improve the Pandora experience.
customer_reviews.author: Behringer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, fast shipping, my wife loves it, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Koung

customer_reviews.title: Teaching an old dog new tricks!!
customer_reviews.text: This computer is a wonderful little thing. It's just taking me a while to learn how to use it as Windows 8 is so different from the other Windows OS. I will and it is becoming easier every day. This little power horse is amazing, and I love the touch screen. It's very fast and I love the instant on feature.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Leonard

product_meta.description:
